div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: ATTENTION TWITTER USERS: Highland is participating in a virtual Football Helmet Bracket put together by @wispreps. Voting starts at 9:00am today! If you are a twitter user, take a minute to vote for the cardinals by going to the @wispreps handle! #cardinalpride #HCScardinals
APRIL 17, 2020 | Mr. Tarrell has his weekly video update this evening. Check it out here: https://5il.co/f8ii Have a great weekend, cardinals! #cardinalpride #HCScardinalshttps://5il.co/f8ii

APRIL 16, 2020 | COVID-19 NEWS RELEASE Our administration has updated information on virtual learning for the 2019-2020 school year, as well as announcements for graduation, summer school, and spring sports. Please view the full press release here: https://5il.co/f6ku #cardinalpride #HCScardinals
Join us {distantly} this evening as we participate in the #BeTheLightWI campaign to honor our student-athletes, especially those in the Class of 2020. More info here: https://5il.co/ewlh

We have one week of virtual learning under our belts. Let's kick off week two with SCHOOL SPIRIT WEEK! We are welcoming all students, staff, family members and community members to join us for dress up days! Let's make learning fun this week with uniquely themed ways to dress! It gives us something to fun to plan and look forward to without leaving the house! Each day there will be a space to share your photos right here on Facebook. Help us spread the word by sharing our post with friends! #cardinalpride #HCScardinals
